page.title: 01AUCHNAGATT IS ........
page.content: F4 {AUCHNAGATT IS................ Auchnagatt is a little village in NorthEast Scotland.Most people are farmers.They grow mainly grass and barley.For leisure there is a badminton club in the Village hall.The village hall is also used for discos, playgroup,concerts and parties.There is one shop and a hotel just for adults. It has a funcion room which can be hired for weddings and adult clubs. Auchnagatt school has 46 pupils and 2 teachers.7 boys in Auchnagatt form a football team. Most people who are not farmers have to travel around for work The countryside is full of trees and wildlife. Most of the trees are conifers and sycamores.There are about 150 people in Auchnagatt.We all like it because of the space and the nice people.
